doc.previous: The following features are characteristic of older Southern  Few generalizations can be made about Southern pronunciation popularly known in the United States as a Southern accent as there is great variation between the regions of the South see the different southern American English dialects section below for more information between older and younger people and between people of different ethnic backgrounds
